name: Tribal Quest - Master of Elements
description:
“Highly Addictive Adrenaline Adventure!
"Endless Runner You Must Download!"



Run, jump and roll your way across a various landscapes.
Dodge vicious creatures, traps and deadly obstacles.
Discover hidden Elements and grab awesome Powers to survive in your journey.
Compete with your friends and rise up the ranks.
Lead your Tribe and become the „Master of Elements“


Face your Fears and Take Control of the Adrenaline Rush!


Features:
-Stunning Art & Retina Graphics
-Simple One-Touch Control
-Stimulating Gameplay
-“Run before Sprint“ Effect
-70+ unique Quests
-90+ Thrilling Totem Stages
-Exciting Upgrades
-Optimized for iPhone 5/5S/5C/iOS7

Tribe is waiting for you! Download Tribal Quest Now!
